DrifterMod:DexDownPower.NAME: Dex Down
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b Dexterity at the end of the turn.

DrifterMod:Drifting.NAME: Drifting...
DESCRIPTIONS: Maintains your drift. If you don't have this, lose all your Drift at the end of the turn.

DrifterMod:Drift.NAME: Drift
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b block and deal #b damage to all enemies at the end of the turn.
